name: The Nordic Association of Marine Insurers
goal: The Nordic Association of Marine Insurers (Cefor) represents marine insurers in the Nordic countries. Our objective is to strengthen and develop the basic concepts of the Nordic marine insurance market and promote the membersâ€™ common interests in key issues for the marine insurance industry.
interests: Competition, Economy, finance and the euro, Energy, Foreign affairs and security policy, Maritime affairs and fisheries, Trade, Trans-European Networks, Transport
